import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Listbox, Transition, Switch } from '@headlessui/react' import { CheckIcon, SelectorIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' const steps = [ { id: 'Step 1', name: 'Job details', href: '#', status: 'current' }, { id: 'Step 2', name: 'Application form', href: '#', status: 'upcoming' }, { id: 'Step 3', name: 'Preview', href: '#', status: 'upcoming' }, ] const sizing = [ { id: 1, type: 'Basic [S, M, L]', value: ['S', 'M', 'L'] }, ] const colours = [ { id: 1, dye: 'Black'}, { id: 2, dye: 'Blue'}, { id: 3, dye: 'Green'}, { id: 4, dye: 'Purple'}, { id: 5, dye: 'Violet'}, { id: 6, dye: 'Indigo'}, { id: 7, dye: 'Pink'}, { id: 8, dye: 'White'}, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } const ProductsAdmin = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(sizing[0]) const [colour, setColours] = useState(colours[0]) const [enabled, setEnabled] = useState(false) return (
    {steps.map((step) => (
  1. {step.status === 'complete' ? ( {step.id} {step.name} ) : step.status === 'current' ? ( {step.id} {step.name} ) : ( {step.id} {step.name} )}
    2. ))}
{/* Product Name Input */}
{/* Sizing List */} {({ open }) => ( <> Sizing Medium
{selected.type} {sizing.map((size) => ( classNames( active ? 'text-white bg-indigo-600' : 'text-gray-900', 'cursor-default select-none relative py-2 pl-3 pr-9' ) } value={size} > {({ selected, active }) => ( <> {size.type} {selected ? ( ) : null} )} ))}
)} {/* Size Metrics Inputs */} {/* Colour */} {({ open }) => ( <> Product Colour/s Use setting
{colour.dye} {colours.map((dye) => ( classNames( active ? 'text-white bg-indigo-600' : 'text-gray-900', 'cursor-default select-none relative py-2 pl-3 pr-9' ) } value={dye} > {({ colour, active }) => ( <> {dye.dye} {colour ? ( ) : null} )} ))}
)}
$

) } export default ProductsAdmin
